section.heading: Judicial review.
section.text: A person or entity aggrieved by a decision of the Office of Administrative Hearings may appeal the decision to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with Chapter 5 of Title 2 [§ 2-501 et seq.] and pursuant to Chapter 18A of Title 2 [§ 2-1831.01 et seq.].

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 deleted the comma preceding “in” and the comma preceding “and.”
